Articles.Content: Excellent mod; watched the dev thread for a long time and am thrilled to have the release version-love it!
Is it possible you can put the version number in the title?

is there a way to get to the mod?? mediafire just sits there ... or maybe i just am getting the link incorrect? nm i had an issues here....

Edited January 13, 2014 by positivewun
This is really really great, I hope you'll gift us with a cockpit with instruments. Support of RasterProp Monitors would be awesome
Does anyone know which nodes have the parts? I am fairly late game in campaign and only have one of them

Does anyone know which nodes have the parts? I am fairly late game in campaign and only have one of them

Orbital Orb is under Specialized Control (Same one as the mk1-2 pod)

Centrifuge is under Meta- Materials (Same one as the large docking port)

Inflato is under Nanolathing (A mod only 1000 science node. It comes after the small cubic strut in Composites)
Ok, thanks!

is there a way to get to the mod?? mediafire just sits there ... or maybe i just am getting the link incorrect? nm i had an issues here....

I had trouble with mediafire... maybe use adfly? I heard you can get some revenue from that.

suggestions:

-spinning of the centrifuge a bit slower

-while spinning, centrifuge needs electricity

overall, awesome little modpack working rght now on my Duna-Mission ship :>

Any info on how big the big ring will be? I would love to see one with two levels and maybe ten space-cucumbers living in it. I would also love to see the Orb get a third seat as well, not that my input is all that valuable.

This mod pack is fantastic, thanks for your efforts.

Any info on how big the big ring will be? I would love to see one with two levels and maybe ten space-cucumbers living in it. I would also love to see the Orb get a third seat as well, not that my input is all that valuable.

This mod pack is fantastic, thanks for your efforts.

The Orbital Orb is loosely inspired by the Soyuz Orbital Module, which only seats two. You could try launching it on top of a MKI-II command pod, and then before reentry and during ascent you move all kerbals to the MKI-II.

Ok, thanks!

You. So we meet again.
So excellent. I need this thing. I will install tonight. Bless you Sir!
Can you upload it on google drive or somewhere else, like filefront, etc... Mediafire is serving viruses, malware and trojans apart from the download in question.

ooooo Thanks so much for this.

I was literally asking someone to a make a stockalike orbital module to fit the mk1-2 before I took my Kerbal break, downloading tonight
...I can't get back in the orb.
Sweet Mod. Always looking for new habitats. Keep up the good work, much appreciated and stuff.
Idea: Inflatable science lab!
Seconded. All in favor?

Idea: Inflatable science lab!

Does that make any sense? The empty space in a science lab is not much, as it's almost all filled with science equipment. Science lab with animation could be one where you can open one section to vacuum.

Does that make any sense? The empty space in a science lab is not much, as it's almost all filled with science equipment. Science lab with animation could be one where you can open one section to vacuum.

One could have the equipment stored compacted in a center column and only when it inflates there is space for the scientists and desks fold out etc. I also like the idea of opening to a vacuum. Shame we dont have a good walking in iva mod yet. Nothke(flexrack creator) had a really nice lab in planning with an airlock and all but i believe he abandoned it. Poor guy. He has too many good ideas and no time to finish them:P
Btw could you add optional support for http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57603-0-23-RasterPropMonitor-make-your-IVA-a-glass-cockpit-(v0-12)-25-Dec ?

Btw could you add optional support for http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57603-0-23-RasterPropMonitor-make-your-IVA-a-glass-cockpit-(v0-12)-25-Dec ?

The orbital orb already supports rpm. They are added when you "install" rpm 0.13
Any hint when you are going to release a "large" version of the centrifuge? The only thing you would have to change is the size of the airlock...
Would be awesome if there was a similar mod for fuel/realfuel/modularfuel tanks, could launch sensibly sized parts inside fairings etc and then inflate in space.

Would be awesome if there was a similar mod for fuel/realfuel/modularfuel tanks, could launch sensibly sized parts inside fairings etc and then inflate in space.

Launch them empty you mean?

And then... what, fuel them in orbit?
